document_data.name: ''Astral Blade''
document_data.creator: [[Marrok]]
document_data.mainbody: '''''Astral Blade''''' was a magical [[longsword]] with an intricate hilt that originated from the [[Shining Knight Arms and Armor]] store of [[Neverwinter]].
document_data.Powers: ''Astral Blade'' was a magical weapon of +1 enchantment that dealt ''sonic'' damage as well as regular ''slashing'' damage.
document_data.History: This blade was created by [[Marrok]], the Master Blacksmith of Shining Knight Arms and Armor of Neverwinter in [[1372 DR]], to aid the heroes investigating the [[Wailing Death]] epidemic.
document_data.Notable Owners of the Astral Blade: * [[Alaffinel]]: a disgraced [[half-celestial]] on the run ''circa'' 1372 DR.
